description.description: I'm going to tell you a secret, pay attention. If you are going to start your trip, to finish it, or maybe just to be in step, you will want to feel happy, excited, expectant to meet new people, to live new experiences, to feel the world, to be free, to be a traveler. Casa Bellavista is the perfect place for your trip and even more for you, the atmosphere is incredible, in our house you can get to know Colombia, our family, as friendly and warm as our people, our mascot (Maya) a little dog who receives everyone as if he knew them for centuries. Anyway, in Casa Bellavista you will be another Colombian, that's why in our house we are all willing to help you and guide you in everything you need. Are you willing to discover it? If your answer is yes, please continue. If your answer is no, come and we will show you the opposite.
